title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 85.6 - Corporate policy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 85.6 - Corporate policy

State Regulations

The application shall include a statement of corporate policy with respect to the use of the aircraft, which shall be used in the normal course of company business. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
85.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
